name: Vivi-memory
description: Memory NFT of Vivi by Neura

attributes.value: Vivi grew up in the vibrant city of Yokohama, where her passion for music and dance shone from a young age. Supported by her loving parents, she rose from school performances to national talent shows, earning fame for her energy and charm. After debuting in a girl group, she became a holographic artist, leading innovation in virtual performance. Her path is one of fearless creativity and heartfelt connection with fans.
